sources.title: Never Kick a Woman (1936)
sources.description: Popeye teaches Olive the art of self-defense, which comes in handy when a woman boxer flirts with him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/never-kick-a-woman-1936/

metadata.Plot: Popeye and Olive pass a gym where an attractive woman is demonstrating boxing equipment. Popeye gets Olive to come in, where he teaches her to box. She has trouble at first, but when the pretty girl comes on to Popeye, she's inspired. They fight over Popeye, with Olive losing until she eats Popeye's spinach.
